text:
Just as defined in the summary.

It would be nice to allow usage of the attribute "classpathref" in the optional 
task "junit", since the classpath used for test-cases should be often the same 
as used for "java" tasks where the attribute "classpathref" is very handy and 
usefull.
creator: Frank.Bechmann@dcw-software.com
steve_l@iseran.com
text:
Is there anything particularly wrong with going
<classpath refid="tests-classpath"/> 
in the JUnit declaration, as we do in the ant build file itself?

creator: Frank.Bechmann@dcw-software.com
